metadata.title: CVE-2023-28772 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - negligible
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.13.3. lib/seq_buf.chas a seq_buf_putmem_hex buffer overflow.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-28772` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-84-generic - 5.4.0-84.94
linux-image-5.4.0-84-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-84.94
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-84-generic - 5.4.0-84.94
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-84-lowlatency - 5.4.0-84.94
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-33-generic - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
